description: This Dart source file defines the AuthService class for a Flutter frontend application. The class manages user authentication functionalities such as login, registration, JWT token storage, and retrieval, interfacing with a backend API using HTTP requests and secure storage.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Provides static methods for user authentication, including login, registration, token management, and session validation.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs user login via API; stores JWT token on success.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks if a JWT token is stored, indicating an authenticated user.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Deletes stored JWT token to log out the user.

methods.name: getJwtToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored JWT token, if available.

methods.name: _getJwtToken
methods.description: Reads the JWT token from secure storage.
